item.title: Getting Started in Xiheframework
item.description: Introduction In the previous post, I introduced the Xiheframework and its core modules. In this post, I will show you how to use it in your project and how to create your own modules in detail. Import Xiheframework Via Git Submodule The recommended way to import Xiheframework is to use Git Submodule. This way, you can easily update Xiheframework to the latest version. To do that: Run the following command from the root of your Unity project folder to add Xiheframework as a submodule.
